00038 #include <map>
00039 #include <cstdlib>
00040 #include <cstdio>
00041 #include <cstring>
00042 #include <SeExpression.h>
00043 #include <png.h>
00044 #include <fstream>
00045 
00047 class ImageSynthExpr:public SeExpression
00048 {
00049 public:
00051     ImageSynthExpr(const std::string& expr)
00052         :SeExpression(expr)
00053     {}
00054 
00056     struct Var:public SeExprScalarVarRef
00057     {
00058         Var(const double val):val(val){}
00059         Var(){}
00060         double val; // independent variable
00061         void eval(const SeExprVarNode* node,SeVec3d& result)
00062         {result[0]=val;}
00063     };
00065     mutable std::map<std::string,Var> vars;
00066 
00068     SeExprVarRef* resolveVar(const std::string& name) const
00069     {
00070         std::map<std::string,Var>::iterator i=vars.find(name);
00071         if(i != vars.end()) return &i->second;
00072         return 0;
00073     }
00074 };
00075 
00076 
00077 double clamp(double x){return std::max(0.,std::min(255.,x));}
00078 
00079 int main(int argc,char *argv[]){
00080     if(argc != 5){
00081         std::cerr<<"Usage: "<<argv[0]<<" <image file> <width> <height> <exprFile>"<<std::endl;
00082         return 1;
00083     }
00084 
00085     // parse arguments
00086     const char* imageFile=argv[1];
00087     const char* exprFile=argv[4];
00088     int width=atoi(argv[2]),height=atoi(argv[3]);
00089     if(width<0 || height<0){
00090         std::cerr<<"invalid width/height"<<std::endl;
00091         return 1;
00092     }
00093 
00094     std::ifstream istream(exprFile);
00095     if(!istream){
00096         std::cerr<<"Cannot read file "<<exprFile<<std::endl;
00097         return 1;
00098     }
00099     std::string exprStr((std::istreambuf_iterator<char>(istream)),std::istreambuf_iterator<char>());
00100     ImageSynthExpr expr(exprStr);
00101 
00102     // make variables
00103     expr.vars["u"]=ImageSynthExpr::Var(0.);
00104     expr.vars["v"]=ImageSynthExpr::Var(0.);
00105     expr.vars["w"]=ImageSynthExpr::Var(width);
00106     expr.vars["h"]=ImageSynthExpr::Var(height);
00107     
00108     // check if expression is valid
00109     bool valid=expr.isValid();
00110     if(!valid){
00111         std::cerr<<"Invalid expression "<<std::endl;
00112         std::cerr<<expr.parseError()<<std::endl;
00113     }
00114 
00115     // evaluate expression
00116     std::cerr<<"Evaluating expresion...from "<<exprFile<<std::endl;
00117     unsigned char* image=new unsigned char[width*height*4];
00118     double one_over_width=1./width,one_over_height=1./height;
00119     double& u=expr.vars["u"].val;
00120     double& v=expr.vars["v"].val;
00121     unsigned char* pixel=image;
00122     for(int row=0;row<height;row++){
00123         for(int col=0;col<width;col++){
00124             u=one_over_width*(col+.5);
00125             v=one_over_height*(row+.5);
00126             SeVec3d result=expr.evaluate();
00127             pixel[0]=clamp(result[0]*256.);
00128             pixel[1]=clamp(result[1]*256.);
00129             pixel[2]=clamp(result[2]*256.);
00130             pixel[3]=255;
00131             pixel+=4;
00132         }
00133     }
00134 
00135     // write image as png
00136     std::cerr<<"Writing image..."<<imageFile<<std::endl;
00137     FILE *fp=fopen(imageFile,"wb");
00138     if(!fp){
00139         perror("fopen");
00140         return 1;
00141     }
00142     png_structp png_ptr;
00143     png_infop info_ptr;
00144     png_ptr=png_create_write_struct(PNG_LIBPNG_VER_STRING,0,0,0);
00145     info_ptr=png_create_info_struct(png_ptr);
00146     png_init_io(png_ptr,fp);
00147     int color_type=PNG_COLOR_TYPE_RGBA;
00148     png_set_IHDR(png_ptr,info_ptr,width,height,8,color_type,PNG_INTERLACE_NONE,PNG_COMPRESSION_TYPE_DEFAULT,PNG_FILTER_TYPE_DEFAULT);
00149     const unsigned char *ptrs[height];
00150     for(int i=0;i<height;i++){
00151         ptrs[i]=&image[width*i*4];
00152     }
00153     png_set_rows(png_ptr,info_ptr,(png_byte**)ptrs);
00154     png_write_png(png_ptr,info_ptr,PNG_TRANSFORM_IDENTITY,0);
00155     
00156     fclose(fp);
00157 }
